sentence.Network_en: People is chickenshit, heart is capacious.
sentence.Network_cn: 人是渺小的，心灵是广阔的。

sentence.Network_en: The private barber parlor was in an annex adjoining a capacious bathroom.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个私人理发室设在与宽敞的浴室毗邻的一个小间里.

sentence.Network_en: Gradually his capacious chin encroached upon the borders of the white cravat.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的广阔的下巴逐渐侵占了白领带的边界.

16. capability n. 容量；能力17. capacious adj. 容量大的，广阔的18. cape n. 海角
Here aperient profit , hinterland is capacious , situation is advantageous ., 这里交通便利 , 腹地广阔 , 地理位置优越.

list.abs: professor johnson is a man of capacious mind ., 约翰逊教授是个心胸开阔的人.
Superior area environment provided capacious hinterland and vast space for the development of Macao economy ., 优越的区域环境为澳门经济的发展提供了广阔的腹地和巨大的空间.

it provides a capacious room for the application of the trenchless technology . in many instances , the open-cut method have been replaced by trenchless method .这便为非开挖技术的应用提供了广阔的空间，在许多情况下，非开挖施工已逐渐代替开挖施工。
when you come to the village , of greet is to arrange orderly aa citizen , capacious street .当你来到村里时，映入眼帘的是排列整齐的民房、宽敞的街道。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin capax, capac- 'capable' + -ious

entry.def: Something that is capacious has a lot of space to put things in.

auth_sentence.content: A spacious harbour capacious of many thousand sail.
auth_sentence.res_content: A spacious harbour capacious of many thousand sail.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A spacious harbour capacious of many thousand sail.

auth_sentence.content: He's not funny like Franklin or capacious like Madison.
auth_sentence.res_content: He's not funny like Franklin or capacious like Madison.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He's not funny like Franklin or capacious like Madison.

auth_sentence.content: So some of the more capacious goals of state-building were absent in this.
auth_sentence.res_content: So some of the more capacious goals of state-building were absent in this.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So some of the more capacious goals of state-building were absent in this.

stems_affixes.word_buile: cap可取之处+able能……的→adj.有能力的, 能干的
capacity[[n.容量,才能]]→adj.宽阔的;容积大的
cap拿,抓,握住+acity表名词→拿住的能力→容量;才能
cap抓+ion表名词→抓住主要内容→标题
